mapper.sql: A.ID, A.PLACE_ID, A.PLACE_TYPE, A.PLACE_NAME, A.PLACE_ADDRESS, A.CITY_CODE, A.USE_UNIT_ID, A.SEAL_TYPE, A.DEPT_CODE, A.DEPT_NAME, A.USE_UNIT_NAME, A.USE_UNIT_ADDRESS, A.USE_UNIT_TYPE, A.USE_UNIT_LEGAL, A.USE_UNIT_ID_CARD, A.USE_UNIT_PHONE, A.MODEL_UDID, A.BATCH_ID, A.MONITOR_TIME, A.SEAL_NAME
mapper.select:
SELECT
,B.nums as num,b.engrave_time
,DECODE(to_char(b.MIN_ENGRAVE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_char(b.engrave_time,'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_char(b.engrave_time,'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_char(b.MIN_ENGRAVE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')||' è‡³ '|| to_char(b.engrave_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')) as engraveMonth
,to_char(b.engrave_time,'yyyy-mm') as engraveMonth
FROM (SELECT A.SEAL_NAME, A.USE_UNIT_ID, COUNT(1) AS NUMS, MAX(ID) AS ID, MAX( A.ENGRAVE_TIME) AS ENGRAVE_TIME, MIN(A.ENGRAVE_TIME) as MIN_ENGRAVE_TIME FROM T_THCS_ANALY_KYZ_TYDWYZBDCKZ A
AND A.SEAL_TYPE=#{query.sealType}
AND A.SEAL_NAME LIKE '%'||#{query.sealName} ||'%'
AND A.USE_UNIT_NAME like #{query.useUnitName}||'%'
AND A.ENGRAVE_TIME between to_date(#{query.startTime}||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{query.endTime}||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
${query.dataScope}
GROUP BY A.SEAL_NAME, A.USE_UNIT_ID
,to_char(A.ENGRAVE_TIME,'yyyy-mm')
) B LEFT JOIN T_THCS_ANALY_KYZ_TYDWYZBDCKZ A ON A.ID = B.ID
AND B.nums
<= ${query.num} >= ${query.num} = ${query.num}
order by b.engrave_time desc
